name: Triceratops Survival Simulator
description:
The Triceratops is one of the most popular and most recognizable dinosaurs. Now is your chance to take control of your very own Triceratops and help him to thrive and survive in this Jurassic Environment. Although he is an herbivore, he has been known to fight against a T-Rex every now and then. This 3D dinosaur simulator allows you to take control of this ferocious dinosaur as he roams near and far to face his enemies. Find your dino mate and start your family. The 3D map is huge so take your time to explore all the areas to find all the bosses. Dinosaur simulation at its best with true open world game play.
The goal of the game is to defeat all 5 bosses. The 5 bosses includes Dilophosaurus, Raptor, Triceratops, Tyrannosaurus Rex, and Pteranodon. The more you play, the more the Dino grows, and the stronger she gets. Loaded with excellent sounds effects for great gaming fun.
Top App Features:
-- Your Triceratops Stamina, Strength, and Speed increase as your skill points increase
-- Survival is the name of the game
-- Defeat all 5 Dinosaur Giants
-- Huge Open Jurassic World 3D Map
-- The weather and time of day is dynamic. The longer you survive, the more changes you will experience. 
-- Fast paced and continuous action 
-- Recharge your energy level by defeating other enemy dinos   

Please stop by our Facebook page and leave us a comment: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames   Also be sure and check out our other 3D animal simulators. We understand that the app is not perfect, and we welcome your constructive criticism. Please send your suggestions to wildfootgames@gmail.com. At Wild Foot we are looking for things we can do to improve the app. Now stop reading and start hunting!
